author: Rodrigo Liberoff
name: mscoders.demo.webchat
description: WebChat que emplea el protocolo Direct Line para hablar con un Azure Bot.

scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack-dev-server --node-env local --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && webpack --node-env development --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:tst: npm run clean && webpack --node-env test --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:pro: npm run clean && webpack --node-env production --config webpack.config.js
